vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H4648H', 'matchingForm': 'מְפִיבֹשֶׁת', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.phi.vo.shet', 'gloss': 'Mephibosheth', '_searchResultRange': '2Sam.21.8', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米非波設', '_es_Gloss': 'boseth', '_zh_Gloss': '米非波设'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4807', 'matchingForm': 'מְרִיב בַּ֫עַל', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.riv ba.al', 'gloss': 'Merib-baal', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.8.34-9.40@2Sam.4.4-1Chr.9.40', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米力巴力', '_es_Gloss': 'baal', '_zh_Gloss': '米力巴力'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4810', 'matchingForm': 'מְרִי בַעַל', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.ri va.al', 'gloss': 'Merib-baal', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.9.40@2Sam.4.4-1Chr.9.40', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米力巴力', '_es_Gloss': 'baal', '_zh_Gloss': '米力巴力'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.4.4;
son of: Jonathan (H3083H);
father of: Micah (H4318H); also called Merib-baal at 1Ch.8.34; 9.40;
§ Mephibosheth = "exterminating the idol"
1) grandson of Saul and son of Rizpah the daughter of Aiah, Saul's concubine; he and his brother Armoni were among the 7 victims surrendered by David to the Gibeonites to avert a famine
2) son of Jonathan and grandson of Saul
2a) also 'Merib-baal'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo del rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín; (b) מְרִיב בַּעַל   descendiente del rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米非波設 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "終結偶像"
1) 掃羅王的兒子, 是其妾愛雅的女兒利斯巴所生; 他和他的兄弟亞摩尼都在被大衛王
交予基遍人以免除饑荒的七名犧牲者之中 (撒下 21:8)
2) 約拿單的兒子, 掃羅的孫子
2a) 又稱 '米力巴力' [4807]
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米非波设 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "终结偶像"
1) 扫罗王的儿子, 是其妾爱雅的女儿利斯巴所生; 他和他的兄弟亚摩尼都在被大卫王
交予基遍人以免除饥荒的七名牺牲者之中 (撒下 21:8)
2) 约拿单的儿子, 扫罗的孙子
2a) 又称 '米力巴力' [4807]

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.21.8;
son of: Saul (H7586G) and Rizpah (H7532);
brother of: Armoni (H0764);
half-brother of: Jonathan (H3083H), Abinadab (H0041H), Malchi-shua (H4444), Merab (H4764), Michal (H4324) and Ish-bosheth (H0378)
§ Mephibosheth = "exterminating the idol"
1) grandson of Saul and son of Rizpah the daughter of Aiah, Saul's concubine; he and his brother Armoni were among the 7 victims surrendered by David to the Gibeonites to avert a famine
2) son of Jonathan and grandson of Saul
2a) also 'Merib-baal'
